metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10205 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Session fixation vulnerability in Zoneminder 1.30 and earlier allows remoteattackers to hijack web sessions via the ZMSESSID cookie.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10205` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg-1').
